idea-plugin.name: DroidForge: Clean Architecture Generator
idea-plugin.description:
DroidForge: Say Goodbye to Boilerplate!

Are you tired of the repetitive task of creating dozens of files and folders every time you start a new feature in your Android project? DroidForge is the professional solution to automate your workflow, letting you focus on what truly matters: building amazing user experiences.

What It Does

With a single action, DroidForge generates a complete, robust, and scalable feature structure based on Clean Architecture principles. It's the perfect tool for maintaining consistency and accelerating your development.

Generated File Structure

For a feature named "MyFeature", you get this entire, compilable structure instantly:

MyFeature/
+-- data/
|   +-- di/
|   |   \-- MyFeatureDataModule.kt
|   +-- mappers/
|   |   \-- MyFeatureMappers.kt
|   +-- model/
|   |   \-- MyFeatureDto.kt
|   \-- repository/
|       \-- DefaultMyFeatureRepository.kt
+-- domain/
|   +-- di/
|   |   \-- MyFeatureDomainModule.kt
|   +-- model/
|   |   \-- MyFeature.kt
|   +-- repository/
|   |   \-- MyFeatureRepository.kt
|   \-- usecase/
|       \-- GetMyFeatureDataUseCase.kt
\-- presentation/
    +-- di/
    |   \-- MyFeaturePresentationModule.kt
    +-- mappers/
    |   \-- MyFeatureUiMapper.kt
    +-- model/
    |   \-- MyFeatureUiModel.kt
    +-- MyFeatureAction.kt
    +-- MyFeatureEvent.kt
    +-- MyFeatureRoute.kt
    +-- MyFeatureScreen.kt
    +-- MyFeatureState.kt
    \-- MyFeatureViewModel.kt

Fully Customizable

A simple dialog lets you configure the generation process:

  • Dependency Injection: Choose between Hilt and Koin.
  • Navigation Style: Select between a standard setup or an advanced style with improved backstack handling (Nav3-style).

How to Use

Right-click on a package -> New -> DroidForge: Clean Architecture Generator.

action.description: Creates a new feature following Clean Architecture principles.
